summary: Sweeney's department store was having its twentieth anniversary celebration on May 3rd. The store was planning an enormous sales promotion with discounts in various departments. The workmen were busy preparing the store by creating signs, displays, and shelving for the sale products. A newspaper campaign was planned to feature the sale products. The store owners hoped to attract customers and offer them bargains on the seven floors.
quotes: especially the dress department the jewelry department and the furniture department
give way store prizes on each one of the seven floors
